metadata.title: 4929-1 -- Bind vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Greg Kuechle discovered that Bind incorrectly handled certain incremental zone updates. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Bind to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2021-25214)  Siva Kakarla discovered that Bind incorrectly handled certain DNAME records. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Bind to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2021-25215)  It was discovered that Bind incorrectly handled GSSAPI security policy negotiation. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause Bind to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2021-25216)
